body_html:
@chandrakantkhandelwal : I have tried installing tensorflow from source code as mentioned in my issue (10739). In that I don't face QuantizedAdd during the import model step. Whereas, it throws error during inference when I quantize the model using "Graph_transform" tool. I was told to modify quantize node option to quantize_nodes(fallback_min=-10, fallback_max=10). Which again provides 0 accuracy in result.
#10739

And yes, drop in accuracy is expected for quantized model as it uses 8-bit calculation unlike conventional 32-bit. But for inception-resnet-v2 model accuracy is 0% (when I quantize it using quantization tool). If resnet-v2 model is not meant to be quantized is still a question. Because for inception-v3 and inception-v4 there was slight drop in accuracy but not like in resnet-v2 model.
